channel.title: K8s on Nithin John George
channel.description: Recent content in K8s on Nithin John George

item.title: Karpenter : Setting Up On EKS Cluster (v1.24) with Spot-Instances
item.description: Maximizing Cost-Efficiency with Karpenter : Setting Up EKS Cluster (v1.24) on Spot-Instances with AWS ALB Ingress Controller, Amazon EBS CSI Driver, and Add-ons Completely using Terraform and Terraform Cloud

item.title: End to End CI/CD pipeline for java based application on K8s
item.description: Project on End to End CI/CD pipeline for java based application using Git,Github,Jenkins,Maven,Sonarqube,Nexus,Slack,Docker and Kuberenets with ECR as private docker registry and Zero Downtime Deployment.
